sys_script.name: Prevent adding other CW's

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_0f1d8399933f391098002763b1891812
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sn_contingent_mgmt_req_worker_map</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Prevent adding other CW's</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var gr1 = new GlideRecord('sn_contingent_mgmt_req_worker_map');
	gr1.addQuery('contingent_request',current.contingent_request);
	gr1.query();
	if(gr1.next()){
		var currentContingentReqNum = gr1.contingent_request.getDisplayValue();
		gs.info('current contingent req num: ' + currentContingentReqNum);
		var currentContingentReqSysID = gr1.contingent_request;
		gs.info('current contingent req num SYS ID: ' + currentContingentReqSysID);
		var gr2 = new GlideRecord('sn_contingent_mgmt_contingent_request');
		gr2.addQuery('sys_id',currentContingentReqSysID);
		gr2.query();
		var assignedContingentOwner = gr2.assigned_to.getDisplayValue();
		gs.info('assigned contingent owner: ' + assignedContingentOwner);
		var assignedContingentOwnerSysID = gr2.assigned_to;
		gs.info('assigned contingent owner SYS ID: ' + assignedContingentOwnerSysID);
	}


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-17 06:30:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0f1d8399933f391098002763b1891812</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Prevent adding other CW's</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Contingent Mgmt Application" source="sn_contingent_mgmt">a573ef1c9313f11098002763b18918b2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Contingent Mgmt Application">a573ef1c9313f11098002763b18918b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0f1d8399933f391098002763b1891812</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-17 06:30:10</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0f1d8399933f391098002763b1891812"/></record_update>
